What is Supervertaler?

The evolution from simple AI translation to intelligent CAT tool

üå±

Where It Started

Supervertaler began as a simple tool: export your bilingual document from memoQ, manually copy the source column into a text file, let Supervertaler translate it using AI with custom prompts, then paste it back and reimport into memoQ.

It worked, but it was manual. Tedious. Limited.

üöÄ

Where It's Going

The new Supervertaler does all of that‚Äîand a whole lot more. It's evolving into a full-fledged CAT tool with all the features you'd expect:

  • ‚úÖ Grid-based translation interface
  • ‚úÖ Translation memory support
  • ‚úÖ Glossary integration
  • ‚úÖ memoQ & CafeTran bilingual workflows
ü§ñ

What Makes It Different

But here's what no other CAT tool currently offers:

A Full-Blown AI-Powered Prompt Manager & Library

Not only can you create, store, and manage system prompts‚ÄîSupervertaler includes an AI-powered system that generates those prompts automatically based on your document.

üí≠

The Vision

Imagine this conversation:

Supervertaler: "Hmm, what kind of document are you translating?"
Supervertaler: "I see. Well, in that case, I recommend you use the following:"
  • ‚ú® System prompt (domain-specific strategy)
  • ‚ú® Custom instructions (project-specific rules)
Supervertaler: "Please allow me to create them for you‚Äîand then use them to actually translate your project, while you sit back and make tea." ‚òï

That's the future. And it's almost here.

Built by a translator, for translators.

Open source, transparent, and designed to make AI-powered translation actually useful.

Powerful Features

Everything you need for professional translation work

Figure Context (Multimodal AI)

Automatically includes images when translating technical documents. Supports GPT-4 Vision, Claude Vision, and Gemini Vision.

  • Auto-detects figure references
  • Visual context for technical translations
  • Project persistence
ü§ñ

Multiple AI Providers

Choose from the best AI models for your translation needs.

  • OpenAI GPT-4 & GPT-4 Turbo
  • Anthropic Claude 3.5 Sonnet
  • Google Gemini 1.5 Pro/Flash

Translation Memory

Fuzzy matching with TMX import/export. Never translate the same sentence twice.

  • TM matches during translation
  • TMX format support
  • Customizable threshold

Smart Prompt Management

  • ü§ñ Prompt Assistant (analyze & refine)
  • Context-aware UI (editor auto-hides)
  • Legal, Medical, Financial specialists
  • Custom instruction templates

Professional CAT Editor

CAT Tool Integration

PDF Rescue (AI OCR)

Flexible Import/Export
